casebody.data:
SYSCO CHARLOTTE, LLC, Plaintiff,
v.
Parimal NAIK, Billy Adams, and Carolina Transitional Services, Inc. d/b/a Carolina Transitional Services, Defendants. No. COA18-1037 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 20, 2019

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED IN PART. VACATED. REMANDED IN PART.
